result.arabic_text: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا
result.translation: 44.Woo aracal (Qhiyaamah Ayro kinnuk) qokol kee cato Yalli leeh usuk cakki awlaytu kinni, Yalli usuk addunyaay akeeral yeemene marah meqe galtoliiy, kaal kelta marah meqe elle cabo-li kinni.
